name: Ethereal Wings
text:
After you perform the upgraded ability, you sprout wings made of pure mana. Temporarily gain the Ethereal Flight ability:
Cost: 1 AP.
Fly a number of spaces equal to twice the mana cost of the upgraded ability.

When your wings fade, you float down a number of squares equal to your speed before plummeting.
Prerequisite: The upgraded ability must be a spell with a mana cost.
